meanings.definition: The quality of being advisable or wise.
meanings.sent1: Her advisabilities always guided her to make good decisions.
meanings.sent2: Considering the advisabilities of the situation, he chose the safest route.
meanings.sent3: The advisabilities of the old owl were sought by all the young animals.
meanings.sent4: His advisabilities shone like a beacon in the sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's advisabilities were like a treasure chest of knowledge.

meanings.definition: The state of being advisable or prudent.
meanings.sent1: The advisabilities of saving money became clear when she needed it most.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, the advisabilities of calmness are crucial.
meanings.sent3: The advisabilities of wearing a raincoat on a sunny day made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His advisabilities were a shield against hasty decisions.
meanings.sent5: The advisabilities of kindness spread warmth in the cold world.
